fme.vm.Subject: FME Training Virtual Machine connection instructions
fme.vm.template.email: Please wait 5-10 minutes after receiving this email before trying to connect to the virtual machine; they take approximately 10 minutes to boot.
The following RDP files can be used to connect to your FME Virtual Machine. The virtual machine will shut down automatically on Friday at 4:30pm Pacific Time.
Please download and connect using __files{0}._url first.
Double-click on _PublicIpAddress_.rdp to open it in Microsoft Remote Desktop.
Some organizations block the port used by RDP; port 3389.
If _PublicIpAddress_.rdp does not work, please download and try the other two RDP files;
These RDP files use different ports that might not be blocked.
If you get an 'Access Denied' error message, then your virtual machine has expired, and you will have to request a new machine

If none of the RDP files will connect, then your Security Administrator is likely using a Web Security Gateway. This cannot be bypassed without contacting your IT Department. Please contact your IT Department, and tell them you need to use Remote Desktop to connect to _PublicIpAddress_
As a last-resort, you can try to use an HTML5 Remote Desktop Client.
